'''Duel Soul''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Tahchin]] with [[Cyno]]. The [[recipe]] for Tahchin is the reward for [[Sumeru]] [[Reputation]] level 4.

Duel Soul restores 34% of the Max [[HP]] and regenerates 980 HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
